Node that performs an entropy calculation and compares two clustering results.

    Class Description
    EntropyCalculator
    Utility class that allows to calculate some entropy and quality values for clustering results given a reference clustering.

Package org.knime.base.node.mine.scorer.entrop Description

Node that performs an entropy calculation and compares two clustering results. The node has two inputs (one containing the reference clustering in one of its columns and the second containing the clustering results to evaluate) and no outport. The view to the node shows some basic statistics like entropy, some quality value, number of clusters, patterns, etc.
